content: Hi, kemon achen?
Alhamdulillah valo achi. Apni kemon achen?
Amio valo achi. If you don't mind, apnar nam jante pari?
Sure! Amar nam Alita. Apnar nam?
Bah! Apnar nam to khub sundor😍. Amar nam A N M Mashud. Apni amake Mashud bolte paren.
Thanks, Mashud vai. Apnar nam o onek sundor. If you don't mind, amra ki eke oporke arektu valovabe jante pari? Asole ami apnake chini na to. Tai freely kotha bolte parchi na.
Hae sure! Ki jante chan bolun?
Accha... Apnar age jante pari? Apni amar boro naki choto kichuito jani na.😔
Great... Amar boyosh 21. Apnar?
Ehemm... 😒 Meyeder age ask korte nei. Janen na!
Opps sorry vul geche apu🥀🤧
It's okay vaiya. Amito moja korchilam🤣. Amar age 20. BTW apni ki koren? I mean study naki job?
Ami study kori. Ar sathe ekta part time job o kori.
Great... Kothay porashuna koren ar ki job koren? Ami just curious. Onno kichu na
BSc in Statistics at Chittagong College, Chittagong. Eta asole National University Bangladesh er under e. Ar job ta ekta typing er. Ora coaching er books, sheets, questions print kore.
Ohh.. Hmm.... Bujhlam. Study ar job ekshathe manage kora ta tough. Apnar subject tao interesting. Statistics diye ki korte chan pore?🤔
Amar iccha data scientist hobo
Wow, that's amazing! Data science er toh onek demand. Coding korte valo lage? Python shekhar iccha ache?🤔
Hae onek valo lage. Ar ami tuktak python pari.
Ami programming pari na.. Tai amar programming korle matha ghure jay!😅 Accha apni amar shathe kotha bole bore hocchen na toh?🙂
Na na amar to valo lagche. Accha onek to amar kotha bollam. Apnar bepare kichu bolen.
Okay, ami jokhon free thaki, boi porte, movie dekhte, human psychology niye porte valo lage. Amar family te maa, baba ar ekta choto bon ache. Bas, ei toh ami😌
Ow... Accha amra to pray same age. apni amake nam dhore dakte paren. Ar tumi koreo dakte paren🤗
Ohh, really? Valo bolchen vaiya. Amar somossa nei. But apnakeo amay nam dhore ar tumi kore dakte hobe.😌
Accha thik ache. Arekta request korbo?
Hae bolen vaiya... Ki request?🤔
Tumi abaro amake apni kore dakle. Ar hae, amake vaiya bolio na.
Opps! mistake 🤭. Vaiya bolle ki hobe?
Asole amito tomar apon vai na. Mane ami tomake amar boner moto dekhi na
Tahole kivabe dekhen?😳 Girlfriend!?
Na girlfriend na. Amra to matro poricito holam. Jani na... Tobe vaiya bolle kemon kemon jani lage😶
Ohh accha... Bujhte parchi🤣
Alita, amra caile tui koreo dakte pari
Tui!? 😳 Evabe to friend ra dake. Amra to friend?
Seta thik. Tahole kivabe friend hoa jay?

Hmm... Bujhte perechi. Tumi amar sathe friendship korte caccho... Tomar sathe aj porichoy hoyeche. Ekhon e kivabe tomar sathe friendship korbo! Amra eksathe arektu time spend kori. Then decide korbo. By the way tui kore bola jay.
Direct bolleito hoy. Eto ghuranor dorkar chilo!... Meyera emon e 🙄
Heyyy! 😒 Excuse me! Amake sob meyeder moto mone korben na. Anyways... Ami shomoy niye friendship korte chai just. Apnar kono opotti ache?
Na na take your time. Tumi rag korecho?

Ami eto tartari rag kori na Mashud. Just meyeder niye ulta palta kotha bolle aktu kharap lage. BTW ami bujhte parchi tui amar valo bondhu hote chas. Accha chol aj theke amra friend🤗.  Ekta question korbo?
Hae kor
Tor age koni girlfriend chilo?🙃 Ba crush ba best friend?🤭
Hae chilo... But ekhon nei
Ohh! breakup hoye geche?🥺 Sorry to hear that. Ki hoyechilo? Ami tor friend na! Amake bokte paros.
Ekhon na. Ekhon or kotha mone ante iccha kortese na. Pore or kotha mone porle bolbo.
Okay pore bolis. By the way ki korchis tui ekhon? Amar na khub ghum pacche😴😪
Accha ghuma tahole. First day te eto kotha bolte nei.
Na re.. somossa nei. Amarto notun friend peye onek khushi khushi lagtese. But Sokale taratari uthte hobe. Tai ghumai jabo ekhon.
Accha kal kotha bolbo. Goodnight 🌌
Okay good night 💤
